p: A cluster analysis using the Euclidian distance method was performed on the oviposition preference data, larval mortality, pupal weight, and adult fecundity of T. absoluta on the range of Solanaceae used here. The statistical software for this analysis was MINITAB version 17. The figures were created using SigmaPlot 12.5 (Systat Software Inc., San Jose, California, USA) and Inkscape 0.91 ( www.inkscape.org).
